exceptions.tactic: destruct (list_bool_choose lb) as [[k1 [tl1 H1]] | [k1 H1]]; destruct (list_pick nat lb k) as [ln [lc [H2 H3]]].
exceptions.exn: In environment k : nat lb : list bool k1 : nat tl1 : list bool H1 : lb = list_repeat Zero k1 ++ One :: tl1 The term "nat" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "list ?X".
The reference ln was not found in the current environment.
The reference lc was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. destruct (list_bool_choose lb) as [[k1 [tl1 H1]] | [k1 H1]]; destruct (list_pick nat lb k) as [ln [lc [H2 H3]]]. - left. exists ln. exists lc. split. + rewrite H2. rewrite H1. reflexivity. + apply H3. - right. exists ln. exists k1. split. + rewrite H2. rewrite H1. reflexivity. + apply H3.
